faq.question: How long does video production take from start to finish?
faq.answer: Most video projects take 2-4 weeks from initial consultation to final delivery, depending on complexity. Short social media videos can be completed in 1-2 weeks, while comprehensive brand films may take 4-6 weeks. We provide a detailed timeline during the planning phase.

faq.question: Do you film on location in Ballinasloe or do we need to travel?
faq.answer: We come to you! We film on location in Ballinasloe and throughout East Galway. Whether it's your business premises, a local landmark, or a specific location you have in mind, our mobile crew brings all necessary equipment to create professional videos wherever you need us.

faq.question: What types of videos do you produce?
faq.answer: We create all types of video content: brand films, product videos, explainer videos, testimonial videos, social media content (Reels, TikToks, Stories), corporate videos, event coverage, promotional ads, and more. Whatever your video needs, we've got you covered.

faq.question: How much does video production cost?
faq.answer: Video production costs vary based on length, complexity, and scope. Simple social media videos start from €1,500, while comprehensive brand films and commercials range from €3,000-€8,000+. We offer flexible packages and can work with most budgets. Contact us for a custom quote.

faq.question: Do you provide scripts or do we need to write them?
faq.answer: We offer full scriptwriting services as part of our video production packages. Our experienced writers craft compelling scripts that tell your story effectively and drive action. Of course, if you already have a script or specific messaging, we're happy to work with that too.

faq.question: Will the videos work on social media platforms like Instagram and TikTok?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We optimize videos for every platform you plan to use. Each platform has different requirements and best practices, so we format and tailor your content accordingly – whether it's vertical video for Instagram Stories, short-form for TikTok, or widescreen for YouTube.

faq.question: Can you help with video marketing strategy and distribution?
faq.answer: Yes! Video production is just part of the equation. We provide comprehensive video marketing strategy, including platform selection, posting schedules, ad campaigns, and performance tracking. We want your videos to reach the right audience and drive real results.

faq.question: What if we need revisions after seeing the first edit?
faq.answer: All our video packages include multiple rounds of revisions during the editing phase. We work closely with you to ensure the final product exceeds your expectations. We don't consider the project complete until you're 100% satisfied.
